column1: (Issued at 07.00 a.m. on 26 September 2025, for next 24 hours)

howers will occur at several places in the sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam to Matara
Winds will be south-westerly and wind speed will be (30-40) kmph.

W
ind speed can increase up to (55-60) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coast extending from
Galle to Pottuvil via Matara and Hambantota and from Puttalam to Kankasanthurai via Mannar.

W
ind speed can increase up to (50-55) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coast extending from

The sea areas off the coast extending from Galle to Pottuvil via Matara and Hambantota and from
Puttalam to Kankasanthurai via Mannar will be rough to very rough at times.

he sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam to Galle via Colombo and from Kankasanthurai to

aval and fishing communities are requested to be vigilant in this regard.
